Reviews.Title: Super phone at Great Price
Reviews.Author: Regi Sylvain
Reviews.Content: Before I go into the pro and cons I would like to share something very important with my fellow customers . Yes there are many cheaper phones available in the market and I have had a chance to compare this with them and the difference in performance is huge.It is worth paying a few dollars more than land up with a phone that will frustrate you so much that you wouldn’t want to buy again. The reason for this phone being miles ahead of the cheaper versions is the "DUAL CORE MTK  6572 with 1.2 GHZ"  which is miles ahead of the sc processor being used in the cheaper phones."Believe me its not worth saving a few bucks and compromise for a phone with sc processor as in all probabilities  it just won't work".Here are some of the good qualities I discovered after using the phone for a while.1. Huge screen with pleasant display and great appearance.But that is not all that is there to it. Set up was extremely simple.2. I just popped in my AT&T; sim and within seconds I was able to register to the network.3. The MTK 6572 dual core works fast and browsing between application is a breeze.4. Downloading android apps from the playstore couldn’t have been easier.5. Picture quality from the main camera is fairly good.6. The huge 8GB memory in the TF card installed is  a feat for those who want all their music and stuff on the phone.7. Wifi range and connectivity is fairly good and I didn’t experience any issues whatsoever.8. Call quality is fine. Didn't have any dropped calls so far.9. Bluetooth connectivity is fine.10.  The price was super.Highly recommended android.

Reviews.Title: " One of the best androids in this price range in the Market "Super phone"
Reviews.Author: Carl Redford
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research I found a decent android phone from a US vendor Lightahead.This phone is a big upgrade over the ones being sold with sc processors.The reasons for my review are given below:1.  Latest Powerful MTK 6572 processor which is really efficient and fast.2.  The 5 inch screen is impressive.3.  Set up is a breeze.I inserted my AT&T; and everything was automatic.4.  Connection to network was almost instant.5.  Nice appearance. Elegant appearance.6.  Unlike the the cheap SC processor the MTK is fast and stable.7.  MMS is fully supported.8.  Dowloading apps is fairly easy and fast.9.  A number of the popular apps are already uploaded in the device.10.  Call quality is extremely clear and calls do not drop at all..11.  It is a 2g phone but much superior to most 3G phones being sold in the market by Chinese sellers.12.  The screen display is clear and colors extremely pleasant.13.  Dual cameras come handy and the picture quality is good.14.  Battery has enough juice to keep you going.15.  The 8GB Tf installed is extremely usefull when it comes to downloading apps/music etc.16.  To sum up it is definitely one of  the best andoid phone in 5.0 inch screen size in the market in this price range.17.  Highly recommended for those looking for a reliable and  low priced android smartphone

Reviews.Title: Unfortunately...
Reviews.Author: Zgina
Reviews.Content: I like the 5" screen, the two batteries included, and the fact that my daughter was able to activate it on her line for me to have better service.Unfortunately, I purchased this phone on the assurance of two previous reviews and to my amazement, I am disappointed. The best purpose this phone is good for is talk and text. Inasmuch as browsing, it freezes a lot and is slow due to being a 2G. It's okay though if you are starting out with a Smartphone for the first time.The Dual Sim card slots when you place one in, the other slot gives off a warning sign indicating, "Please check to see if the sim card is ready." Funny because you know you have a sim card installed, but you have to keep dealing with the warning icon on the notification bar.Other than the minor setbacks I do like the phone, but because I am more advanced with Smartphones, I have to give it to another family member that is in need of a phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Job
Reviews.Author: Alice Bangura
Reviews.Content: great product but the producer have to improve on the sound quality especially the in call volume is very low

Reviews.Title: 3G over 850 Mhz
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo Aguilar
Reviews.Content: The phone is very good, this works normally over 2G but does not work over 850 Mzh with 3G.I try several times to fond user guide in internet and is impossible.Finally, the user guide that comes inside box is for Iphone !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: CELL PHONE LA9500MT(MTK)
Reviews.Author: LUIS J.GRIMALDO
Reviews.Content: PHONE CAME WITH  NOT INSTRCTION MANUAL.I CAN NOT USE THE CAMARA  IF I DONT HAVE THE INSTRUCTION MANUAL..THE PICTURES ARE VERY DARK.

Reviews.Title: Very annoying.
Reviews.Author: Tammy G.
Reviews.Content: I cannot find a case for product.  Now my screen is broken and I have only had the phone for less than 1 month.  Also there is a ribbing motor sound in all calls.  Very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Holmes "Trisha"
Reviews.Content: Terrible phone. Couldn't receive half my calls and hardly any texts. If you still want to use a phone I don't recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: awful awful phone
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: This phone was clearly perviously owned, due to the fact some aps, like instagram, won't let me sign up because  "too many users on this device" I couldn't send any texts for about 2 days, it kept saying that they were invalid numbers, but those numbers could text me, I just couldn't reply. When i did finally send texts it didn't show up in my chat history, and the only time their text showed up was in a popup window. the second i would exit out of that, there was no indication they ever sent me anything. The sim card kept saying it was damaged no matter how many SD cards I put, and I even had to rest the phone, still telling me it's a damaged SD card. The camera quality is pretty bad, and it doesn't matter how many times i re-download google play it tells me it cannot be opened. Sometimes upload icons appear on images and sometimes they don't. I could make a list of errors.  Don't buy this phone, spend the extra money for something that works.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: MDG
Reviews.Content: "The phone felt solid and well belt. Worked perfectly right out of the box. The processor is a lot faster than other cheap China made phones I've used. If it will stay running for a few months I plan on buying more for back-ups."

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: JrMommy24
Reviews.Content: I received my phone Friday morning and so dar I LOVE IT!!!! It comes with an extra battery, a phone case, headphones and a charger ... I absolutely fell in love with this phone at first touch and sight .. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PHONE, by the way I'm with T-Mobile and I walked straight into T-Mobile and walked straight out because set up was a BREEZE!!!! GET THIS PHONE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Hmmm -browses amazon-
Reviews.Author: Crispy
Reviews.Content: -sees a phone--looks at another phone--compares the two-Look up The galaxy S4 in white,  can't believe no b ody mentioned this

Reviews.Title: dont buy one
Reviews.Author: don magness
Reviews.Content: this is the worst phone ever. i've had it a little over a month and it doesnt work any more, i missed my return window so i am stuck with it. it wont even go to my home pg, taken the battery out, done all things to try and get it to work. it just doesnt. if light head was a good company they would at least replace it. maybe its a one time fluke, but i would never buy this phone or from this company again they need to make good on this

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Angel Roberto Alburquerque
Reviews.Content: good phone, I really liked the screen, and this nicely updated, the camera makes a horrible photos, is good phone, for economic

Reviews.Title: Lightahead
Reviews.Author: Ellen Z.
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but have trouble down loading pictures. I am using my Sims card from my old phone ...so therefore I only have one Sims card. I receive messages to install the second Sims card all the time. Also when I transferred my contacts over from my old phone to the Lightahead I can't send a text. The contacts show up with only six numerical digits instead of nine ....meaning the area code does not show on my screen......there I get an error message. I do like the big 5.0 inch screen. If I make a call I get a buzzing sound before the person answers my call. All in all for the price it work fine. I guess I need to read the instructions for problem solving.

Reviews.Title: Lightahead® I9500 (N9000) (MTK) Unlocked 5.0 inch touch screen Dual SIM...
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I have this phone for 2 weeks, I love the phone but straight talk has been nothing but trouble but will keep you posted.
